subheadings.rawText: Proficient software engineer with \textbf{2+} years of experience across all stages of the development lifecycle \newline Demonstrated technical and collaborative skills through \textbf{5+} coding competitions, \textbf{4} hackathons, and \textbf{10+} projects \newline Adaptable and self-driven with a proven ability to quickly master new technologies and build scalable systems

subheadings.position: Teaching Assistant - Object Oriented Programming, Java
resumeItems: Conducted office hours to help students master \textbf{OOP} concepts and clarify \textbf{SOLID} principles
Delivered and showcased advanced pricing features to empower \textbf{42,000+} NetSuite customers with flexible price rules
Developed \textbf{Java 21} services using \textbf{Dependency Injection} and \textbf{SOLID} principles to enable rule-based pricing
Built \textbf{PL/SQL} procedures integrated with \textbf{Oracle DB} to ensure asynchronous price updates across millions of items

Improved a Kubernetes operator’s performance by introducing multiprocessing in \textbf{Python}, reducing startup time by \textbf{80%} and deploying globally across production landscapes managed by Gardener

Evaluated Vertical Pod Autoscaler (VPA) for \textbf{optimizing CPU and memory} usage through in-cluster testing under different workloads; presented findings, leading to a decision to defer adoption for SAP HANA Cloud Data Lake services
Developed heuristics in \textbf{C++} to enhance A* algorithm efficiency during the FPGA routing stage
Secured \textbf{70%} market share with \textbf{600+} financial institution branches and \textbf{13000} ITMs globally by delivering essential reporting capabilities for terminal activity and balances

Designed and deployed high-performance containerized Spring Boot microservices using \textbf{Java 17} on GCP, architected using the \textbf{Strategy pattern} and \textbf{Plugin Architecture} to maximize system flexibility and extensibility
Adopted multithreaded architecture for backend services to reduce report generation and upload times by \textbf{40%}

Built a Spring Boot JWT authorization service using Spring Security and Kubernetes secrets, securing Google Cloud Storage access and integrating with NGINX for token validation in a report retrieval workflow
Enhanced \textbf{UX} for \textbf{1000+} bank tellers by enabling dynamic, customizable reporting through parameterized SQL queries
Delivered software for teller cash recyclers for \textbf{8+} major financial institutions

Optimized bank teller UX by empowering clients to execute pivotal operations like secure money transfers and interbranch cash shipments through real-time data streaming with WebSockets, reducing latency by \textbf{99.9%}

Developed backend transaction services empowering tellers to execute secure cash recycler operations, by implementing Spring Boot REST APIs alongside Node.js transaction flows and data management with Cassandra
Automated microservice deployments with Jenkins CI/CD, accelerating releases via Maven builds and Helm charts
Led in-person labs, delivered a \textbf{400}-person lecture on recursion, and taught C, Linux and graph theory concepts
Decreased unit test runtime by \textbf{80%} using parallel execution with the fastcov Python utility
Implemented comprehensive system-level and regression tests in \textbf{C} for embedded Unix-like QNX platform
Achieved \textbf{100%} code coverage, ensuring reliability and robustness across tested components
\textbf{Languages}: Java, Python, SQL, C, C++, TypeScript, Go
\textbf{Tools}: Docker, Kubernetes, GCP, AWS, Gardener, REST API, Kafka, Git, Maven, Jenkins, Google Cloud Pub/Sub, Redis, PostgreSQL, Cassandra, Oracle DB
\textbf{Frameworks}: Spring Boot, Hibernate, Warp, Flask, Node.js, Guice, Angular, PyTorch, YOLOv11, JUnit

\textbf{Techniques}: SOLID Principles, Design Patterns, Distributed and Parallel Systems Architecture, Relational Database Design, Kubernetes Operator & Autoscaling (HPA, VPA) Development, Cloud-Native Monitoring, Agile
\textbf{Interests}: Bouldering, Table Tennis, Volleyball, World Geography, Downhill Skiing, Biathlon

subheadings.techstack: Python, PyTorch, GPU, YOLOv11, Mask R-CNN
resumeItems: Set up and trained machine learning models \textbf{YOLOv11} and \textbf{Mask R-CNN} (Detectron2) on a 4.3k image climbing dataset for automated holds and routes detection
Applied \textbf{K-Means} and \textbf{DBSCAN} clustering with \textbf{Gaussian blur} preprocessing for color-based route classification

Built a Bitcoin-based blockchain from scratch, integrating \textbf{5+} cryptographic algorithms to secure university club voting
Implemented RSA Blind Signature protocol for confidential elections in a proof-of-concept system for \textbf{100+} students
